name: Cambridge English Listening
description: Listen to everyday conversations recorded by native British English speakers and improve listening skills. Listen to podcast hosts Tess, Ravi, Adam and Rob chatting with different people and talking about different everyday topics, such as their favourite celebrities, making plans for the weekend, having a dinner party and which cities they like to live in.  The app helps you learn everyday English as well as great new features that help you listen and understand the conversations.
